title: Typeface help for business card
content:
Please help!  
I'm designing my business cards for my psychotherapy practice.  
I'm looking for a font that will look good in 8pt to 11pt, in both caps and lowercase.  
I'd like a font that is contemporary but also has a solid and classic feel to it.  
I also need the font to go well with the Pristina font, as one line in my logo uses that font.

I was going to use Barbedor, but I'm not loving it because the capital "i" resembles the number "1" to my eye, and I don't think Barbedor works well with Pristina.

Many, many thanks!
author: willow1
